Conclusion: this is not working, there's no selective
            pressure to learn in a particular way.

I added selective pressure by having only one offer to copy.

300 [-1.09219207 -1.21179676  1.0555898   1.25003072] 0.32
600 [-1.40371444 -1.09120282  1.62325742  0.86285977] 0.3
